text: Sottens was a municipality in the Gros-de-Vaud district in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 July 2011, the municipalities of Villars-Tiercelin, Montaubion-Chardonney, Sottens, Villars-Mendraz and Peney-le-Jorat joined together to become the new municipality of Jorat-Menthue.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 17 February 2011 It is known for its radio transmitter for the French language Swiss radio, built in 1931. == References == ==Other websites== Category:2011 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Sottens
